New Records: Virat Kohli and Shubman Gill put on 189 runs for India
Mohammed Shami took five wickets for 18 runs
Virat Kohli scored 88 runs before being dismissed
Key Match Events: India skittle Sri Lanka for 55 runs
Shreyas Iyer took over after Kohli's dismissal
Sri Lanka lost four wickets for three runs
Charith Asalanka and Dushan Hemantha were dismissed cheaply
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma commented on the victory and qualification
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed happiness about qualifying
Kusal Mendis was disappointed with the performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: India secured their seventh win in a row
The match was significant for qualifying in the World Cup semi-finals
